name: Hentai Cut and Nut
description:
CUT to the chase with this one! Test your reflexes (as well as your patience and stamina 😉) as you selectively uncover delicious juicy jugs of the Cherry Kiss girls of your dreams, lewd nude and in compromising positions.~ Reveal steamy scenes from our fan favorite Visual Novel and cut through to unveil deliciously plump booty and booba in every level!

Go for the goal and pop those tiddies out or strategically cut chunks to reveal a true prize. How you choose to strip these fine femme figures is up to you, but be sure to watch out for any freaky enemy types looking to shut down the panty party.

48 Mouth watering Levels
12 bosses
16 Companion sprite figures
And a whole lotta nuttin!

Get a good sneak peek into the visual novel world and the sexy harem of ladies that keep those juices flowing!

**Thoroughly tested; this game can be played with one hand**
